basic.description: An advanced seminar in selected topics which may include experiments in theory and criticism, scenographic design, acting, and mise en scène. Students will be expected to develop a specific area of individual research.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Women and Theatre II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 4 and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a grade of B- in DRAM300) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or Level 3 in a GNDS plan, or permission of the Department.
